analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#146-147) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#150-153)
index in BitMEDCrowdsale.deleteGrantee (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1359) is a local variable never initialiazed

Vault.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#745-769) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(supporter,tokensToClaim) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#760-761)

Vault.claimAllSupporterTokensByOwner (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#770-774) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(supporter,depositedTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#772)

RefundVault.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#933-958) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(supporter,tokensToClaim) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#948)

RefundVault.claimAllSupporterTokensByOwner (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#962-976) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(supporter,depositedTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#970-973)

BitMEDCrowdsale.finalization has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.issue(presaleGranteesMapKeys[i],presaleGranteesMap[presaleGranteesMapKeys[i]]) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1270-1271)

Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1027-1046) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_startTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1033-1034)

Crowdsale.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1090-1100) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- withinPeriod = block.timestamp >= startTime && block.timestamp <= endTime (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1096-1097)
	- withinPeriod && nonZeroPurchase (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1097-1100)

Crowdsale.hasEnded (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1106-1108) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > endTime (/unique_chucks/27/0x2b7a6374fbf06c080c36ff43fa99f9d6f09019ab.sol#1108)
